com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.subordinate

Class AbstractAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.subordinate.AbstractAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSetEnable, AbstractSetMandatory, AbstractSetVisible

    public abstract class AbstractAction
extends Object
implements Action
    A class of "action functions" that apply a value to a target, where the target could be an individual component or a group of components.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Martin Shevchenko, Jonathan Austin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
